id,
code,
user_name,
pass_word,
user_type,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update user
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
